definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: The quake struck near the Santa Cruz Islands, which are part of the Solomon Islands nation.
sentences.chinese: 地震发生在所罗门群岛境内的圣克鲁斯群岛附近。

sentences.english: That battle started in the Solomons and New Guinea last summer.
sentences.chinese: 那个战役去年夏天在所罗门群岛和新几内亚岛打响。
盟军侦查员，吉佐，所罗门群岛，2002。

sentences.english: Today the northern Solomons are part of Papua New Guinea. The southern islands are an independent country.
sentences.chinese: 目前，北部所罗门群岛是巴布亚新几内亚的一部分。

sentences.english: Solomon Islands is located in the circum-Pacific volcanic belt, and earthquakes are frequent.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门群岛地处环太平洋火山带，地震频发。

sentences.english: Ului degraded slightly before dealing the southern Solomon Islands a glancing blow.
sentences.chinese: 在扫过所罗门群岛之前，它略有减弱。

pinyin: Xin1 Ka1 li3 duo1 ni2 ya4

definition: Port Moresby, capital of Papua New Guinea

pinyin: Ba1 bu4 ya4 Xin1 Ji3 nei4 ya4
Ma3 li3 ya4 na4 Qun2 dao3

definition: Aleutian Islands (trailing 2250 km southwest of Alaska almost down to Kamtchatka)

pinyin: Ji2 er3 bo2 te4 Qun2 dao3
